citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40-11:15,
3:40 on 01-SEP-16.
Inspector arrived at 10:40 am knock on door, honk gov horn, called out for licensee and called both listed phone
numbers and left message. Inspector left at 11:15 am. Inspector returned at 3:40 pm knocked door and called listed
phone number, licensee answered stating they were unavailable for an inspection at this time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40-11:15,  
3:40  on 01-SEP-16.
Inspector arrived at 10:40 am knock on door, honk gov horn, called out for licensee and called both listed phone
numbers and left message. Inspector left at 11:15 am.  Inspector returned at 3:40 pm knocked door and called listed
phone number,  licensee answered stating they were unavailable for an inspection at this time.
